casebody.data:
STATE
v.
David FELTON. No. 393P03-5. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 12, 2006. Amy C. Kunstling, Assistant Attorney General, Michael Nifong, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th day of June 2006 by Defendant for Application for Peremptory "Writ of Mandamus":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 12th day of June 2006."
